actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an alternative method of allocation of property taxes for cooperative housing corporations.

summary.text: Co-op Property Tax Equity Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit tenant shareholders of a cooperative housing corporation to calculate the amount of their income tax deduction for real property taxes on the basis of separate appraisals for dwelling units, rather than on ownership of shares in the corporation, where State law requires an allocation of taxes based on such separate appraisals.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an alternative method of allocation of property taxes for cooperative housing corporations.
